attributes.action: Make it compulsory for restaurants to provide clear nutritional information on their websites and menus
attributes.additional_details:
Obesity is a national problem and is recognised as such by the government.

As such, food establishments, especially the larger ones such, should be required to make nutritional information available.

All too often I have emailed these companies only to be told that this information is not available or something they are working on.

Make this compulsory information!
